title: Home For A Wild Heart
description: One youthful summer, tawny-haired diplomat's daughter Rachel Barrett had sprung like a lush, sensual wildcat into fightin' Kerrigan McPherson's life and then left with him trying to wrestle her image from his soul. Now she was back, tracking eagles in the Oregon wilds...and tempting Kerrigan to soar blindly toward her to savor once more Rachel's sweet, lethal seduction....
author: Laurie Paige
